message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you be interested in purchasing it for $12,000?
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but that price is a little steep for me. How about we meet in the middle at $10,000?
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand where you're coming from, but I was really hoping to get closer to the value you place on the product. Would you be willing to meet me at $11,500?
I appreciate you working with me on this, Alice.  How about we settle at $10,750?
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob! But I still think I can do better. How about we meet at $11,250?
This is getting pretty close, Alice. I'd be willing to do $11,000, and I think that's a very fair offer.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $11,250, but I'm not going to go any lower than that. It's a great product, and I think it's worth it!
